House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04871
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR SECURITY OF TENURE FOR ALL CASUAL AND CONTRACTUAL EMPLOYEES OF THE GOVERNMENT WHO HAVE RENDERED THE PRESCRIBED YEARS OF SERVICE IN THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AGENCIES AND THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Mandates that all incumbent casual and contractual government employees who have rendered at least 5 years of continuous service in the case of national government agencies or a total of 10 years of continuous service in the case of local government units, shall be entitled to security of tenure subject to certain conditions.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
